typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ntt_notificationemailaddress as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		owninguser as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		importsequencenumber as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_cmpcreditorid as string,
		ntt_breathingspacecreditorid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		ntt_notificationaddressid as string,
		ntt_identifier as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_adhoccreditorid as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceCreditorId as string,
		strNTTName as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean,
		strNTTCMPCreditorId as string,
		strNTTAdhocCreditorId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceValidationBSCreditor
source(output(
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		owninguser as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		createdby as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		ntt_breathingspaceadhoccreditorid as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_createdonportal as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceAdhocCreditorId as string,
		strNTTName as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceDebtorId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceBSAdhocCreditor
source(output(
		inss_identifier as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		ownerid as string,
		statuscode as string,
		importsequencenumber as string,
		createdby as string,
		inss_englandwalesregistered as string,
		inss_cmpcreditorid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		owninguser as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		statecode as string,
		inss_name as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		strINSSCMPCreditorId as string,
		strINSSName as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceCMPCreditor
DerivedColumnCreditorType select(mapColumn(
		ntt_notificationemailaddress,
		owningbusinessunit,
		owninguser,
		ntt_name,
		statecode,
		statuscode,
		importsequencenumber,
		createdby,
		ntt_cmpcreditorid,
		ntt_breathingspacecreditorid,
		ownerid,
		modifiedon,
		ntt_notificationaddressid,
		ntt_identifier,
		modifiedby,
		createdon,
		ntt_adhoccreditorid,
		intBatchId,
		partdist,
		blIsValid,
		tsCreatedOn,
		tsModifiedOn,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceCreditorId,
		strNTTName,
		blIsTruncate,
		strNTTCMPCreditorId,
		strNTTAdhocCreditorId,
		strINSSCMPCreditorId,
		strINSSCMPCreditorName,
		strCMPCreditorType,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceAdhocCreditorId,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceAdhocCreditorName,
		strAdhocCreditorType,
		strCreditorType
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBSCreditor
SelectBSCreditor alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSink
sourceBSAdhocCreditor select(mapColumn(
		strNTTBreathingSpaceAdhocCreditorId,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceAdhocCreditorName = strNTTName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBSAdhocCreditor
sourceCMPCreditor select(mapColumn(
		strINSSCMPCreditorId,
		strINSSCMPCreditorName = strINSSName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCMPCreditor
sourceValidationBSCreditor, DerivedColumnCMPCreditor join(strNTTCMPCreditorId == strINSSCMPCreditorId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCMPCreditor
JoinCMPCreditor, DerivedColumnAdhocCreditor join(strNTTAdhocCreditorId == strNTTBreathingSpaceAdhocCreditorId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAdhocCreditor
SelectBSAdhocCreditor derive(strAdhocCreditorType = "Adhoc") ~> DerivedColumnAdhocCreditor
SelectCMPCreditor derive(strCMPCreditorType = "CMP") ~> DerivedColumnCMPCreditor
JoinAdhocCreditor derive(strCreditorType = coalesce(strAdhocCreditorType, strCMPCreditorType, 'BSS')) ~> DerivedColumnCreditorType
AlterRowSink sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/creditors/breathingspacecreditor',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['strNTTBreathingSpaceCreditorId'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkODS
